div.p:
To be honest, I'm not the most organized person in the world.

I'm a management coordinator so this is a bit of a problem.

For me, filing documents properly and finding them has always been frustrating and stressful.

GCDOCS has made my life a whole lot easier.

I do a lot of presentations.

The GCDOCS menu functions are so logical it's easy for me to organize, save and locate them in the system.

Also, it works with the applications I use the most—MS Word, PowerPoint, and Outlook.

With GCDOCS, everyone in the department now uses the same method to categorize and save working files.

I really appreciate that.

Now I don't have to keep asking my colleagues where things are.

At the same time, I don't have to keep explaining to others how and where I've stored team files.

All in all, GCDOCS saves us all time. And, it makes my life a lot less stressful.
